summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1781, for the improvement of Twenty-fourth Avenue Northwest, from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, and Twenty-fifth Avenue Northwest from West Sixty-fifth Street to West Seventieth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all wyes, manholes, lampholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewering and draining of said district, under Ordinance No. 18680, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
